amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve the FCC's authority to act in the public interest, convenience, and necessity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-490 to state that nothing in H.R. 2666 shall affect the authority of the Commission to act in the public interest, convenience, and necessity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 231 (Roll no. 151).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 231 (Roll no. 151).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. McNerney.
